name: Cardio
dec: A solid cardio workout is the backbone of an effective workout regime, which is why we run cardio classes twice daily.

name: Lifting
dec: Lifting isn’t just about strength. While you will build great core, arm, and leg muscles while lifting.

name: Press & Back
dec: There are few better full-body workouts available than our press and back classes.

name: AirYoga
dec: Sure, you’ve heard or regular yoga, but what about trying out some new moves while floating feet into the air?

name: Cardio Boxing
dec: Sometimes nothing feels as good as putting on your gloves and kicking the crap out of a boxing bag or a set of pads.

name: Body Building
dec: Want to tone, get muscle definition, and feel stronger in your everyday life
